scripts.docker: docker run -it -p 9090:9090 --rm --name tron -e "allowSameTokenName=1" -e "allowTvmTransferTrc10=1" -e "showQueryString=true" -e "showBody=true" -e "formatJson=true" -e "mnemonic=happy happy happy happy happy happy happy happy happy happy happy happy" trontools/quickstart
scripts.dev: npm run compile && npm run test
